text: Ambalapara is a gram panchayat in the Palakkad district, state of Kerala, India. It is the local government organisation that serves the villages of Ambalapara-I and Ambalapara-II, and forms a part of the Ottapalam taluk. ==Demographics== Ambalappara has a population of 34, 969 people. According to bureacractic niceties, Ambalapara-I has 12,418 people and Ambalapara-II has 22,551 people. ==Post office== Ambalappara has a post office and the pin-code is 679512.https://pincode.net.in/KERALA/PALAKKAD/A/AMBALAPARA == References == Category:Gram panchayats in Palakkad district
title: Ambalappara
